void getNodeAndChildren ( const xmlpp::Node *  node,
std::ostream &  textFromBodyFile,
unsigned int  indentation,
std::set< std::string > &  uniqueAttribs 
)

Get node of parsed html code and its children Gets unique attribues from html text.

These attributes are hrefs from "<a href="">". This function is recursive.

Parameters
nodeof xml/html structure
textFromBodyFilehtml code
indentation
uniqueAttribsstore attributes get from textFromBodyFile
